iti89:4.4: Commentary gives _me sutaṁ_ as variant here. But this construction is found in a number places with _vissuta_. See [mn86:18.40](), [thag16.8:15.2]().
iti89:5.3: This is a standard hell in later Brahmanical literature (eg. Bhāgavata Purāṇa 5.26.28). Despite its fame, this, together with its parallel at [pli-tv-kd17:4.8.11](), is the only mention of this hell in early Buddhism.
